description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named HelloController, which provides basic endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info. It uses Spring Boot annotations and integrates Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for greetings, documentation redirect, health check, and app info.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI, constructing the URL based on the incoming request, supporting proxies and forwarded headers.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
